events.message: I just received my new headphones and unfortunately one earcup is producing a static noise, which makes it impossible to use properly.
The issue reported involves a faulty product component causing audio malfunction, categorized under product defect.
Your case has been assigned to one of our audio equipment specialists who will assist you further.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out and sorry to hear about the issue with your headphones. I'm here to help you resolve this.
Could you please let us know if there are any physical damages or scratches on the headphones and whether you have tried using a different device?
There are no visible scratches or damage on the headphones, and I have tested them with two different phones but the static noise persists.
We will arrange a replacement shipment for you immediately and provide a prepaid label for you to return the defective headphones at no cost.
Thank you for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the replacement option and will send the defective unit back promptly.
We have processed your replacement request and sent the return label. You should receive the replacement headphones within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement headphones and that they are functioning as expected.
I received the replacement yesterday and it works perfectly! Thanks for the excellent support.
We are glad your issue was resolved satisfactorily. Closing the case now but feel free to contact us if you need further assistance.
